thread.title: The Notebook director Nick Cassavetes takes over Road House remake starring UFC champion Ronda Rousey - Movies
thread.title_full: The Notebook director Nick Cassavetes takes over Road House remake starring UFC champion Ronda Rousey - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Ali Plumb
title: The Notebook director Nick Cassavetes takes over Road House remake starring UFC champion Ronda Rousey - Movies
text: The long-awaited Road House remake has found a new director: Nick Cassavetes, who previously brought the world The Notebook, John Q and My Sister's Keeper.He replaces Fast & Furious director Rob Cohen, who was originally attached to the project. © Getty Images / Ray TamarraMixed martial artist Ronda Rousey is set to star in the planned Road House remake UFC star Ronda Rousey is playing the role made famous by the late Patrick Swayze in MGM's revival, bouncing for notorious dive bar the Double Deuce.Before you worry whether the man who helmed the notorious blub-fest The Notebook is the right person for the job, remember that he also wrote and directed the excellent Alpha Dog. © WENNPatrick Swayze as Dalton, Head Bouncer at the Double Deuce Club in cult classic Road House (1989) Sure, there was The Other Woman last year - 23% on Rotten Tomatoes - but let's just pretend that didn't happen. The Road House remake has no confirmed release date, but is set to start shooting early next year.
